languages.text: "Я знаю, что всю дорогу талдычила — Леди Теодора то, Леди Теодора се... Знаете, вам ей, может, и не стать, но и ей до вас ой как далеко. И я счастлива, что на смену ей пришли именно вы, и с вами, а не с кем другим, меня жизнь свела. Вот. А теперь, пока меня совсем не развезло от сантиментов, давайте сменим тему, ладно?"

"I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, что всю дорогу талдычила — Леди Теодора то, Леди Теодора се... Знаете, вам ей, может, и не стать, но и ей до вас ой как далеко. И я счастлива, что на смену ей пришли именно вы, и с вами, а не с кем другим, меня жизнь свела. Вот. А теперь, пока меня совсем не развезло от сантиментов, давайте сменим тему, ладно?"

traits.locale_text: "I know what I have been repeating the entire way — Lady Theodora this, Lady Theodora that... You know, you may never become her, but she would never be you, either. And I am glad it was you who replaced her, and that life brought together you and I instead of somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, shall we?"

And I am glad it was you who replaced her, and that life brought together you and I instead of somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, shall we?"

And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

languages.text: “我知道，我一直在地说西奥多拉夫人这个，西奥多拉夫人那个……或许你永远都无法成为她那样的人，但她也永远无法成为你这样的人。我很高兴她的接班人是你，而不是别人，我也很高兴和你一起度过了这段日子。好了，我就说到这里吧。咱们换个话题吧，不然我可能就要哭得停不下来了，好吗？”
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

traits.locale_text: “我知道，我一直在地说西奥多拉夫人这个，西奥多拉夫人那个……或许你永远都无法成为她那样的人，但她也永远无法成为你这样的人。我很高兴她的接班人是你，而不是别人，我也很高兴和你一起度过了这段日子。好了，我就说到这里吧。咱们换个话题吧，不然我可能就要哭得停不下来了，好吗？”

languages.text: «Sé que me he pasado la mayor parte del tiempo hablando de lady Theodora... ¿Sabe? Puede que nunca llegue a ser lo que fue ella, pero ella tampoco podría haber hecho lo que ha hecho usted. Me alegro de que la haya reemplazado usted y de que la vida me llevara a su lado, y no al de otra persona. Queda dicho. Ahora cambiemos de tema antes de que me ponga más sensiblera, ¿de acuerdo?».
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

traits.locale_text: «Sé que me he pasado la mayor parte del tiempo hablando de lady Theodora... ¿Sabe? Puede que nunca llegue a ser lo que fue ella, pero ella tampoco podría haber hecho lo que ha hecho usted. Me alegro de que la haya reemplazado usted y de que la vida me llevara a su lado, y no al de otra persona. Queda dicho. Ahora cambiemos de tema antes de que me ponga más sensiblera, ¿de acuerdo?».

languages.text: 「あたい、『シオドーラ様はああだった』『シオドーラ様はこうだった』…って、延々と話し続けていたわよね。あなたが彼女の代わりになれるわけではないし、彼女だって、あなたの代わりにはなれなかったはずよ。それに、彼女の代わりを務めてくれたのがあなたで良かったって思うの。他の誰かとではなく、あなたと人生を共にすることができて嬉しいわ。言いたかったのそれだけ。感傷に浸る前に、話題を変えてもいいかしら？」
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたい、『シオドーラ様はああだった』『シオドーラ様はこうだった』…って、延々と話し続けていたわよね。あなたが彼女の代わりになれるわけではないし、彼女だって、あなたの代わりにはなれなかったはずよ。それに、彼女の代わりを務めてくれたのがあなたで良かったって思うの。他の誰かとではなく、あなたと人生を共にすることができて嬉しいわ。言いたかったのそれだけ。感傷に浸る前に、話題を変えてもいいかしら？」

languages.text: "Ich weiß, ich rede ständig von 'Lady Theodora hier' und 'Lady Theodora da' ... Ihr werdet vielleicht nie werden, wer sie war. Aber sie hätte auch nie sein können, wer Ihr seid. Und ich bin froh, dass Ihr sie ersetzt habt, und dass das Leben mich mit Euch zusammengeführt hat, nicht mit jemand anderem. Da habt Ihr's. Und nun wechseln wir das Thema, ehe ich noch ganz sentimental werde, ja?"
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, ich rede ständig von 'Lady Theodora hier' und 'Lady Theodora da' ... Ihr werdet vielleicht nie werden, wer sie war. Aber sie hätte auch nie sein können, wer Ihr seid. Und ich bin froh, dass Ihr sie ersetzt habt, und dass das Leben mich mit Euch zusammengeführt hat, nicht mit jemand anderem. Da habt Ihr's. Und nun wechseln wir das Thema, ehe ich noch ganz sentimental werde, ja?"

languages.text: « Je sais que je n'ai pas arrêté de vous rebattre les oreilles avec dame Théodora... mais même si vous ne deviendrez jamais comme elle, et qu'elle n'aurait jamais pu être comme vous, je suis contente que vous lui ayez succédé et que la vie nous ait {mf|réunis|réunies}. Voilà qui est dit. Sur ce, changeons plutôt de sujet avant que je tombe dans la sensiblerie. »
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que je n'ai pas arrêté de vous rebattre les oreilles avec dame Théodora... mais même si vous ne deviendrez jamais comme elle, et qu'elle n'aurait jamais pu être comme vous, je suis contente que vous lui ayez succédé et que la vie nous ait {mf|réunis|réunies}. Voilà qui est dit. Sur ce, changeons plutôt de sujet avant que je tombe dans la sensiblerie. »

languages.text: "En başından beri 'Leydi Theodora şöyle', 'Leydi Theodora böyle' diye diye başının etini yediğimi biliyorum. Biliyorsun ki asla onun gibi biri olamazsın, o da asla senin gibi biri olamazdı. Onun yerine geçen kişi sen olduğun için, hayat beni başkasının değil de senin yanına fırlatıp attığı için çok mutluyum. Diyeceklerim bu kadar. İyice duygusallaşmadan önce konuyu değiştirelim, olur mu?"
languages.original_text: "I know I've been harping on all this time about 'Lady Theodora this,' 'Lady Theodora that'... You know, you may never become who she was, but she could never have been who you are, either. And I'm glad it was you who replaced her, and that life threw me together with you, and not with somebody else. So there. Now let's change the subject before I get all sentimental, all right?"
